name: Wizard's Mansion
description:
You @ break in an old wizard's mansion, filled with monsters ready to protect their master's staff $ which holds all the power. Fighting them is no option, as you are just someone who likes to be a rogue – try to sneak past imps, skeleton archers, and much worse!

Linux only for the moment.

To pick up items, turn towards them and [e] use them. When moving, you don't turn automatically, so you can walk backwards. Turning uses a game turn. Ignore `y`s when you see them.
